  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114086</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114086</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fleming's right-hand rule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flemings rechte Richtlinie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La règle droite de Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Régua right-hand de Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola destra del Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεξής κανόνας Fleming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regla derecha de Fleming</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows Fleming's right-hand rule used in determining the direction of motion (thumb), magnetic field direction (first finger), and current direction (second finger).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Fleming's right-hand rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Flemings die rechte 
Richtlinie, die verwendet wird, wenn sie die Richtung der Bewegung 
(Daumen) feststellt, magnetisch, auffangen Richtung (ersten 
Finger) und Stromrichtung (zweiten Finger).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la règle droite de 
Fleming utilisée en déterminant la direction du mouvement 
(pouce), la direction de champ magnétique (premier doigt), et la 
direction actuelle (deuxième doigt).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a régua right-hand de 
Fleming usada em determinar o sentido do movimento (polegar), o 
sentido do campo magnético (primeiro dedo), e o sentido atual 
(segundo dedo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la regola destra del 
Fleming usata nella determinazione il senso di movimento (pollice), il
senso del campo magnetico (prima barretta) e del senso corrente 
(seconda barretta).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δεξή κανόνα Fleming 
που χρησιμοποιείται στον καθορισμό της κατεύθυνσης της κίνησης 
(αντίχειρας), της κατεύθυνσης μαγνητικών πεδίων (πρώτο δάχτυλο),
και της παρούσας κατεύθυνσης (δεύτερο δάχτυλο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la regla derecha de 
Fleming usada en la determinación de la dirección del movimiento 
(pulgar), de la dirección del campo magnético (primer dedo), y de la
dirección actual (segundo dedo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitleitungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flemings rechte Richtlinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
